programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails wants to join a family, so he finds a billboard about a family looking for their missing son.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic rescues Captain Rescue, but soon finds his heroic efforts hampered by Rescue's incompetence; after Sonic rejects his attempts to help, Rescue is tricked by Robotnik into capturing Sonic.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Grounder makes a bet with Scratch that he can catch Sonic first; the robotic chicken orders a build-it-yourself Eagle Copter kit from his favorite TV Show.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic suspects Robotnik when he wakes up and finds his shoes gone, but he can't run without the shoes, so he has to use detective work.

programme.title: Flame of Recca
programme.sub-title: Temptation of the Beautiful Women: The Deadly Duo!
programme.desc: Tokiya and Recca must work out their conflict when faced with a new challenge.

programme.title: Flame of Recca
programme.desc: Neon's powers threaten an entire stadium.

programme.title: Flame of Recca
programme.desc: While Team Hokage gets to advance on a technicality, their next round requires Koganei to step up like never before.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan travels by plane and sea as he tries to rescue Lana from the clutches of Industria soldiers.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan arrives on a small island and meets Jimsy, a boy who has been living in the wild; as Conan gets to know his new friend, the ship Barracuda offers an opportunity to finally reach Industria.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Jimsy attempt to stowaway aboard the Barracuda, but are caught and punished by the ship's captain Dyce; they get to work as the ship heads for Industria.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: The Barracuda finally arrives in Industria and Conan and Jimsy are stunned to find it bleak and deserted; Conan races through the complex searching for Lana.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Lana are finally reunited but the villainous Lepka continues to pursue them; shocked by Lepka's brutality, Captain Dyce's allegiances begin to shift.

programme.title: Ninja Robots
programme.desc: Princess Romina opens up about the big mission that brought her to the human beings.

programme.title: Ninja Robots
programme.desc: Icelander's crazy obsession for Princess Romina pushes him toward a treacherous path.

programme.title: Ninja Robots
programme.desc: The Radorio mother ship crumbles under an attack; Icelander contemplates joining hands with Grathan.

programme.title: Ninja Robots
programme.desc: Both battling sides carefully review their plans in the wake of Icelander's shocking move.

programme.sub-title: The Horrible Trap of Summoner Ascot
programme.desc: Hikaru, Umi and Fuu meet a new animal friend in the forest. But he might be more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.desc: Alcyone manages to trick Ascot into freeing her from a barrier that was holding her against her will. Promising she would give power to one of his monsters so it would be strong enough to kill the Magic Knights.

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.sub-title: Revival of Selece, the Legendary Rune-God
programme.desc: The girls reach a lake, and Mokona reveals that a Rune God rests within it. They travel underneath the water thanks to Mokona's magic. Umi does not feel good, and starts to glow. She wanders off, and suddenly they notice a painting of a blue dragon.

programme.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
programme.sub-title: The Legend of the Rune-Gods - In Cephiro, Another World
programme.desc: The girls take off for the flying mountain, the very same mountain they first saw when they arrived in Cephiro; inside the mountain stands the castle where Princess Emeraude is being held; when they almost reach it, Zagato attacks them.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.desc: The Nautilus is caught in a mine field in an underwater cavern and Sanson, Hanson and Jean try to remove the mines.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.sub-title: A New Student on the Nautilus
programme.desc: Sanson, Hanson and Grandis become official crew members of the Nautilus.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.desc: Nadia tries to please Jean by dressing up for him, but he is too busy to notice.

programme.title: Space Adventure COBRA
programme.desc: Cobra decides to visit Jingoro, the man who helped build his ship, The Turtle. However, upon arriving at Jingoro's house, he finds it ransacked and Jingoro's daughter kidnapped.

programme.title: Space Adventure COBRA
programme.sub-title: The Tomb at the Bottom of the Ocean
programme.desc: Cobra and Dominique are on vacation together when they see a massive cruise ship destroyed. Before they can investigate, they're attacked and Dominique is kidnapped.

programme.title: Space Adventure COBRA

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Farewell, Amanojaku - The Descent of Omha
programme.desc: Ouma intends to kill Kayako's children, Satsuki and Keiichirou; the battle against Ouma will require help.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Moving to a new town is tough, and with no friends, it can be scary; in Satsuki's case, that last part isn't helped any when she, her little brother, and three kids from school end up in the old schoolhouse, which happens to be haunted by ghosts.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Akagami Aogami: A Hand Reaches Out from the Toilet.
programme.desc: Something is stinking up the town, and it isn't just urban reconstruction; a ghost has invaded the school's bathrooms, and it's up to Satsuki and the gang to find out how to put it back to sleep; the old book left by Satsuki's mom just might be it.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: An unknown, vagabond Medabot rescues a drowning puppy.
